honors_and_awards.title: Gold Medalist | Inter IIT Tech Meet 11.0
honors_and_awards.description: Won Gold Medal in The Paradime Product Challenge by paradime.io, contributing to IIT Kharagpur winning the General Championship Cup in Inter IIT Tech Meet 2023

honors_and_awards.title: Campus Winners at Sprinklr APM Case Challenge
honors_and_awards.description: Contrived a 3-phase VR customer support plan for machine-assisted users and conferred as campus winners of IIT Kharagpur

honors_and_awards.title: Finalist at Solvays Business Games 2022
honors_and_awards.description: Finalist at Solvays Business Games, Europe's largest student case competition, 2022 (top international participants among 55+ nationalities)
